name: boutique-unified
description: Application unifi√©e - Frontend React + Backend Express

scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:yarn: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock && yarn install --ignore-engines && chmod +x node_modules/.bin/* && yarn build
scripts.build:simple: cd frontend && npm install && npx react-scripts build
